title: E-Commerce
description: An online shopping website created using CodeIgniter, HTML, CSS, jQuery in a span of a week.

title: Multiplayer Game
description: A pacman clone game with multiplayer and chatroom created using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, SocketIO, Express

title: Classroom
description: Similar to google classroom website this was created using Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap in a span of a week to think and create.

title: Movie App
description: A Movie App where you can browse and see reviews of a movie created using HTML, CSS, React, TMDB Api.
